about_the_game:
**Once you purchase this DLC, log into Freestyle 2 and check your Gift Box. **
**Please consider carefully when you are purchasing the DLC, the items cannot be refunded **
**Refunds and Chargebacks are against our Freestyle 2's User Agreement. **
If you have failed to receive the item after purchase, please contact Freestyle 2 **

Freestyle2 - Must-have summer Outfit Box

DLC Content:
  • Hawaiian sunglasses - Rare (Unisex)
  • Pimk Long Cat - Magic (Unisex)
  • Let's Vacation Hair - Rare (Male or Female)
  • Let's Vacation Top - Rare (Male or Female)
  • Let's Vacation Bottom - Rare (Male or Female)
  • Let's Vacation Sneakers - Rare (Male)
  • Let's Vacation Flats - Rare (Female)

DLC Descriptions:
Get ready to turn up the heat on the court with the Must-Have Summer Outfit Box!
This DLC is packed with stylish and rare items to make your summer unforgettable.
Show off your unique fashion sense and dominate every game in style!

* If your character is male, you’ll receive male outfits. If your character is female, you’ll receive female outfits.

If you were not able to receive the DLC, please logout and login again.
if you still didn't get your DLC, please send us an Email.

Please follow the instruction in the Getting Started Manual. (** Guide images may contain a different package image)
Find the Getting Started Manual at Quick Reference. which is placed on the right hand side of the page.

name: Freestyle2 - Must-have summer Outfit Box

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Freestyle2 - Must-have summer Outfit Box

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Window XP
  • Processor: Pentium 4 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GT 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Window 7
  • Processor: Pentium 4 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GEFORCE 9800 GT 1GB or Higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

short_description: Hit the court this summer with the coolest looks and make every game a fashion statement!
supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Thai, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
